sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function ProductPopUp({closeModal}, props) { let url = 'http://makeup-api.herokuapp.com/api/v1/products.json?brand=maybelline' const [products, setProducts] = useState(null) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(url) .then(res => { setProducts(res.data) }) }, [url]) return (

{name}

${props.price}

{props.rating} stars

{props.desc}
) }
